thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Standard Chartered Receives Lead Underwriting Licence For Non-Financial Panda Bonds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Standard Chartered Receives Lead Underwriting Licence For Non-Financial Panda Bonds
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Standard Chartered Plc:
* STANDARD CHARTERED BANK (CHINA) LTD SAYS IT RECEIVES LEAD UNDERWRITING LICENSE FOR NON-FINANCIAL CORPORATE PANDA BONDS FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FINANCIAL MARKET INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS
* STANDARD CHARTERED CHINAâ€˜S CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER SAYS THE LICENSE WILL ENABLE STANDARD CHARTERED TO MAKE MORE CONTRIBUTIONS TO CHINA INTERBANK BOND MARKET BY FURTHER PROMOTING DIVERSIFICATION OF BOTH ISSUERS AND INVESTORS Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
